attributes.action: Stop the Dumping of Toxic Waste in Poor Countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Does anyone wonder where their old thrown away TV ends up? Well half way around the world in a much poorer country, just dumped illegally wherever's possible. This causes many effects, not only to the enviroment but to people too including young children. The poisonous chemicals damage their skin horrifically leaving them scared for life. With your help we can help put a stop to this if the government make a crackdown on unwanted goods being dumped overbroad illegally. Please help.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
